summary: An email from Daniel Hose at the Metropolitan Correctional Center notifying lieutenants that eight FBI officials will be visiting the institution on August 17, 2019, to perform investigative matters inside the SHU (Special Housing Unit). The email instructs that a lieutenant must be available to accompany them.

persons.name: Daniel Hose
persons.context: Appears to be sending an institutional notification about an upcoming FBI visit to the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: FBI Visit to MCC SHU
events.description: Eight FBI officials visited the Metropolitan Correctional Center's Special Housing Unit (SHU) to perform investigative matters.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
SHU (Special Housing Unit) within the Metropolitan Correctional Center
keyFacts: Eight FBI officials were scheduled to visit the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on August 17, 2019.
The visit was for investigative matters inside the Special Housing Unit (SHU).
The email instructs that a lieutenant must be available to accompany the FBI officials during their visit.
The email was sent on August 16, 2019, by Daniel Hose, indicating internal prison communication regarding the FBI's investigative activities.
